Detailed Description

template<class VALUE_TYPE, class INTEGER_TYPE, class VALUE_SAVER_T>
class ItemComboTable< VALUE_TYPE, INTEGER_TYPE, VALUE_SAVER_T >

Table to use for storing a few combinations of large data.

See UserRightsItemTable for an example of usage.

Parameters:
VALUE_TYPE The data to store.
VALUE_SAVER Something that has the functions writeValue( DataBuffer*, const VALUE_TYPE& val ) readValue( DataBuffer*, VALUE_TYPE& val ) getValSizeInDataBuffer( const VALUE_TYPE& val )
INTEGER_TYPE Type of UNSIGNED integer to map the combinations into. If less than 256 combos, use uint8 etc.

const itemMap_t &  itemsToAdd
)  [inline]
 

Creates a new table with the supplied default value.

Parameters:
defaultVal The value to return if an item isn't found in the table. Items with exactly this value will not be added to the table.
itemsToAdd The items to add.
